Literature.Title: A Systematic Study of the Stability, Safety, and Efficacy of the de novo Designed Antimicrobial Peptide PepD2 and Its Modified Derivatives Against Acinetobacter baumannii
Literature.Author: Chen SP, Chen EH, Yang SY, Kuo PS, Jan HM, Hsieh MY, Lee KT, Lin CH, Chen RP

Literature.Title: De Novo Design of Antimicrobial Peptides With a Special Charge Pattern and Their Application in Combating Plant Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Chen EHL, Weng CW, Li YM, Wu MC, Yang CC, Lee KT, Chen RPY, Cheng CP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=>32µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum(MIC=4µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum(MBC=4µg/ml),Dickeya dadantii(MIC=4µg/ml),Dickeya dadantii(MBC=8µg/ml),Ralstonia solanacearum(MIC=8µg/ml),Ralstonia solanacearum(MBC=8µg/ml),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=16µg/ml),Botrytis cinerea(MFC=16µg/ml),Colletotrichum gloeosporioides(MIC=8µg/ml),Colletotrichum gloeosporioides(MFC=16µg/ml)
